website_summaries.verdict: A discreet, compact model that packs a punch despite its small, unusual design.
pros: The brushless motor of this mini massage gun keeps it quiet despite its speed of up to 2,400 percussions per minute
The included soft case makes it easy to slip the Mini into your bag and take it anywhere
cons: The design takes some getting used to
Does not reach as deep as more expensive models

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!! The Best Theragun yet.
customer_reviews.text: "Your health is your wealth". 100% worth the investment. I actually have had all three versions of the Theragun at some point and this one is prob the best. The small size makes it so easy to use and hit hard spots. It is very powerful for how small it is. The V2 is def a bit more powerful and I would recommend that for more serious use. The mini is perfect for on the go use, personal use and I would highly recommend it. The small design def makes it easier to hit harder spots. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: So quiet my dog sleeps through the vibration!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Theragun knocked it out of the park with the mini! It's so quiet and soothing; great help for people who have labor intensive work! The arches on my feet never felt more relaxed after 8 hours of being on my feet. The charger is very compact too, a great companion to a travel sized massager. If anybody is looking for something like this, I recommend this product to anyone who's in need of a good therapeutic relaxation and can't get to a massage therapist during these times. I have seen many other products that are much louder and do not quite get the job done. This is definitely for everyone !!
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Macias

customer_reviews.title: Same great experience in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I owned one of the original theragun models and took the opportunity to get the latest technology revision in a smaller and much cheaper package. At first you may think its not as manageable - not the same grip, but for personal use this is actually better, smaller equals easier to maneuver into those troublesome spots!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wookey

customer_reviews.title: Theragun Mini - Perfect for Everyday Use & Travel
customer_reviews.text: The theragun mini is so great for all my needs. It's great before any cardio activity - I typically use this before any run to loosen and massage my muscles. This really helps me improve my range of motion personally and run with less pain. After running, it is the perfect post exercise tool for massaging my feet, calves, quads, and hamstrings etc. Additionally, it is great on the lower back/neck after a long work day. The best part is the size of this - it fits easily into any day pack, bag, or luggage, and is very easy to transport. Highly recommend this product for anyone with soreness, or who exercises often!
customer_reviews.author: Peter O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: The Theragun Mini is incredible! My boyfriend and I both work out a lot and this product has been a lifesaver. It really helps to ease our sore muscles and any other pains or kinks we get. I also love how portable it is! We can take it on vacation or wherever we go and always have a massage at our fingertips. Although this is a mini, it is still super powerful and works just as great as the full-sized one. Would highly recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how nice the Theragun mini is built and how well it works. The different speed levels provide a variety of different levels that can I really like. It’s also compact but doesn’t lose any power in what it does. I can carry it with me wherever I go after a long day of exercising and have it ready to go. With that said, I think the MINI might be the better option for those that were interested in the other models because it is much smaller and you throw it in your bag whenever you go out and it won’t be as much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben C.

customer_reviews.title: Defective Unit Right Out Of The Box
customer_reviews.text: Received a defective unit. Device believed that it was charging despite being off the charger. This prevented it from operating at all. I’ve had cheaper therapy guns that functioned great and wanted to give this “top-of-the-line” brand a try. Super disappointed. Haven’t been able to get through to customer support to troubleshoot or discuss return. Thankfully Amazon will accept a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Winwood

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hold for small hands
customer_reviews.text: This thing is actually very hard to hold with small hands. And it is awkward. I can't get it to my back. So it is only good for neck. (And legs/arms if you wanted it for that-- but I need one for my neck and back.) Some reviews said that they could hold it with small hands so I wanted to post this to say that I could not. It has a very strong vibration and there is nothing to hold onto.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Q.

customer_reviews.title: Must Purchase For Any Fitness Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Being someone who works out and plays multiple sports, I was in the search for a tool that I can add to my recovery regimen. All of the current massage guns on the market are large so it's not convenient to carry around so I knew I had to get the Theragun Mini. The Theragun Mini is great because it's quiet and I can easily bring it to me to the gym or the park when I train. I use it as both a prehab and post workout treatment for my tight muscles! Highly recommend for anyone who can use a on-the-go massage tool that looks sleek and aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: dustin chau

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Solution For My Back!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Theragun Mini Is SO Handy! I’ve been using my Theragun Mini for about a week now and I LOVE it! I was really skeptical about whether or not it would work well, but boy was I in for a ride. Years of lower-back pain was instantly relieved simply by run it over the pain areas. I 1000% back this product and I look forward to bringing my Theragun Mini with me everywhere I go! This was one of the best purchases I’ve ever made!
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Compact yet powerful
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product! It is so compact yet powerful to get the job done. My significant other and I usually feel tension or some soreness after working out and this is the best to help relieve that. I also love how easy it is to travel with and does not take much room in our gym bag. Highly recommend this product to anyone that experiences the same thing as us. It will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Cy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Works efficiently to loosen tight muscles. It's very powerful. This is not a relaxing massager; it's more like the sort of machine that you'd encounter in PT. Also it's lightweight and easy to handle, even for someone with small hands.
customer_reviews.author: camille johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing massage gun!!
customer_reviews.text: Compact and aesthetic massage gun. There are three settings and the first level is already pretty strong enough to get the job done. Travel size allows for convenience to bring anywhere compared to the other massage guns. The massage gun itself is also really silent which I did not expect it to be but love it! This product is worth purchasing and the price for this massage gun is so budget-friendly that I even purchased my mother her own massage gun as well! This review says it all, you have to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenmuel Quinn Lanuza

customer_reviews.title: Product failed afer two months
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband as a Fathers Day gift in June. By the end of August, it would no longer power on. We don't know if the switch is bad or if it won't take a charge. The return window has already closed, so we are stuck with a completely unusable product.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Tool for anyone with a bad back/neck
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful, powerful tool for anyone with a bad back or neck. Compared to larger, full priced models, this was what I needed and works great! Even the lowest setting is intense, but the handle grip makes it easy to alter force, angle, and pressure.
customer_reviews.author: TWBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use than full size
customer_reviews.text: The great thing about the small one is that it is easier to grip than the large one. This is built perfectly for your hand to grasp the device. Quieter than the large one too, so you can watch TV and use this at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works best with continued use
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my arm and it seems to be helping a lot..
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.  Very strong.  Holds charge a long time.  Would recommend for traveling therapist.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Holds a charge a long time . Very strong massage tool. Need to be careful with use because so strong. Great for therapists who travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for trips. I went to Vegas this weekend and brought this product with me. It is small fits well in my bag and works like a charm despite its size. I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.author: Leeann

customer_reviews.title: Compact, soothing, love it!
customer_reviews.text: So compact and so helpful after a day of mountain biking! I am working from home and it’s great to be able to take care of my muscles after sitting around more than normal.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: The best for lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: This device has helped ease my lower back pain that I have been unable to fix for almost a year. Cannot recommend enough
customer_reviews.author: Ash Payami

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent in awhile
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have purchased this a long time ago. I use mine before and after my workouts to help fight off delayed onset muscle soreness. Battery life is great and for its size the stall point is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick knots. Good battery charge for its size.
customer_reviews.author: minibluebear

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good range of power levels
customer_reviews.text: Very small and powerful, can be a bit heavy if holding it a weird way/for a long time. Great massage gun though, everyone that tried it loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed by the power in this $200 tool. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Layne Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: It’s not price wise worthy
customer_reviews.text: Not fulfilled my expectation specially it’s not quite what they advertise
customer_reviews.author: Miah Salim

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and sSTRONG!
customer_reviews.text: Nice small size with a lot of power! Much more quiet than previous models. Very portable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: cautiously purchased, so far pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a few times a week about a month before leaving this review. handy to have by my side during working from home -- my desk set up is not as ergonomic as I wish so the back. Percussive therapy is new for me but it's nice! I much prefer it to the massage chair backs we've had in the past with the rolling balls . i think the other models of theragun are nice because of the bigger handles. but I can still use this one for myself on my back. The grip is really nice too. On a full charge it lasts really long as well!
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: A. Maze. Ing.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! So helpful for tight muscles post (successful) spine surgery, while rehabbing. Great tool for home when it's an off day for PT.
customer_reviews.author: Emily G.

customer_reviews.title: Release muscle tension instantly
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why I waited so long to purchase this product but I’m glad I bought it. This unit helps release the tightness in my muscles after a workout . It’s easy to use and holds a charge for a long time
customer_reviews.author: rosas

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little massage gun — would recommend buying the soft attachment as well from their website
customer_reviews.author: Colton Sinning

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Literally stopped working after one day. I had high hopes and expectations for this device especially coming from a brand like theragun. Somethings up with the battery. Charging it and still doesn’t work after many hours and long hold press to turn it on. I wish I could get my money back. Disappointing. Lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I had the larger gun version and it really took another person to use it on you . This size is perfect for solo jobs . I like how compact it ease and very powerful . Worth the money imo .
customer_reviews.author: Justin sinkler

customer_reviews.title: The Mini is Magic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This portable massage device is worth every penny. I expected the Theragun to be loud and disruptive but upon use I was really surprised at how quite the tool is, breaking up muscle knots and increase circulation. I can’t recommend this product enough as it has really taken my recovery routine to a new level.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly compact for travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Theragun Pro a few months back and the advanced technology was mind-blowing. Loved it so much that I had to come back for the mini! This is perfect to bring along in my day-to-day gym bag or during travel. You’d be surprised how much power is packed into such a small design. Would highly recommend it for those who enjoy traveling that need a quick, convenient massage.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Ty

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Home massages are forever changed in a good way. This little thing gets all the knots! Easy to use and I guess it’s good for the money although I wish it was cheaper anyway lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my son. It is a great product. Helps to remove stress knots from the back.
customer_reviews.author: GQuincy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful muscle workout
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, and aggressive muscle workout. It makes me quickly forget about my achy muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Burrough

customer_reviews.title: Powerful. Easy. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This lil guy packs a punch! Perfect for what I wanted it for - relief from muscle pain. Totally worth the money. Very strong. Light, easy to hold (I have small hands) and easy to take on the go. But this doesn't mean it's any less powerful!
customer_reviews.author: mashedpotatoes

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: The mini is a useful product and easy to use. It works wonders on sore muscles. Recharges quickly. Easy to hold (actually pleasant to hold).
customer_reviews.author: Elinor Garely

customer_reviews.title: Comparing to cheap one
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably good and powerful. I got a cheap one earlier for 30 bucks and it was so much weaker, and you could only put s certain amount of pressure or the massage stopped. This one on the other hand is incredible. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: This is super effective!
customer_reviews.text: The Theragun Mini packs a very powerful punch even compared to the higher end Theraguns. It is cheaper and smaller and easier to transport but will still give you the deep tissue massage you're looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Coby P.

customer_reviews.title: This theragun has major quality problem. It makes louse noise like dry oil not lubricating,
customer_reviews.text: Need a way or access to open this unit up to add lubrication or spray W4D to reduce the noise Feeling the vibrating hand is ready to fly. We need a way to replace the broken unit. Need longer guaranty period instead of 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Vu

customer_reviews.title: my absolute favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: I leave this one in my car and my pro at home. it's the perfecton the go device, especially now that im taking a ton of long road trips with my fam.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: the color is EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: So bright!! Battery lasts for hours.I wasnt sure which once i wanted so i got in touch with customer support and they were amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Box came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I gave it two stars bc I ordered this as a gift and the box came damaged. Hoping the item is ok when opened and not going to waste my time sending it back but this is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far,so very good! The only slight issue is I have small hands which tire quickly. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Shumate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: As the other reviews reflect this is a well made, powerful addition to the theragun product line. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: David Campaniello

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super easy to use, easy to travel with and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: I got this after borrowing a friends. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great but....it turned out by itself!
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager! Portable and powerful. But after a few weeks - it turned on by itself while sitting on a table! We turned it off and set it on a chair. In the morning, there was a mark on the chair where the Theragun had turned on and rubbed the fabric, leaving a 6" mark. No idea how long it was on but battery was still charged. Returned for an exchange and hoping this one doesn't have that problem. If not, it would be a 5+ star review.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: I have no experience with other models/brands but I'm impressed with the effectiveness of this massage tool. Leaves muscles feeling great for a while after using it. Strong enough you don't want to use it against bone but highly effective for muscles. I'll probably buy more to gifts to the folks and for the extended families. Seems high quality, long battery life, charges quickly. Kind of heavy due to the battery, so best used oriented up/down to let gravity help. All in all, I'm impressed with its effectiveness and I highly recommend (particularly if you have no experience with massage tools).
customer_reviews.author: Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too strong!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for use on my aching shoulder. It feels like a jackhammer punching you over and over. I hated this product - returned. Amazon as always was great and refunded. Be careful buying these, my shoulder was worse after using this for just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: judy913

customer_reviews.title: Thickness?
customer_reviews.text: When reviewing, I was asked to rate this out of 5 stars on “thickness”. Naturally I gave it a 5.... okay, so this thing is great. It is perfect for while cooling down, watching TV at the end of the night after training.
customer_reviews.author: RealMrBurgundy

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with the muscle relief!
customer_reviews.text: I first experienced the Theragun at my Chiropractor’s office when he used it before an alignment. I was thrilled to find the mini available for at home use. I work on a computer all day and it brings relief to my shoulders and upper back, which helps to keep my muscles from tensing up and causing discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must need for portable massages!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product not too long ago because I needed a massage gun which I could take to the gym and on airplane flights which would be more compatible. This one does not only the job but helps my muscle be more relaxed after working out! It’s easy to use and portable, as I can bring it anywhere like it’s a phone! I would highly recommend this product to anyone who’s interested in a massage gun; doesn’t disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Javier

customer_reviews.title: Goes everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Really excited to get this and have it work exactly how I wanted it to. Fits in every bag, and feels great after a long day biking. Overall really happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Brown

product_meta.title: Theragun Mini - All-New 4th Generation Portable Muscle Treatment Massage Gun
feature_bullets: QUIET FOR ANY SETTING - Proprietary brushless QX35 motor with QuietForce Technology allows powerful yet ultra-quiet muscle treatment anytime, anywhere
ULTRA-PORTABLE - never-before-seen balance between power and size, making it a convenient option for getting Theragun quality relief on the go. INCLUDES SOFT CASE.
150-MIN. BATTERY LIFE - With up to 150 min. of sustained run time, mini sets the standard for true portability and is there for you right when you need it
ERGONOMIC GRIP - smooth, ergonomic grip is easy to hold while reducing strain on your hands and wrists
3 SCIENTIFICALLY CALIBRATED SPEEDS - 1750, 2100, and 2400 percussions per minute, each scientifically calibrated to deliver greater therapeutic benefits for the body.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
